title: What’s new in Ahrefs? (August 2023)
description: Introducing the brand new Opportunities and GSC overview reports, the Interaction to Next Paint (INP) metric in Site Audit, and more.
content: Andrei Țiț Showing you how to make the most out of Ahrefs. Mostly through: how-to videos, product updates, webinars, and brochures.
